Text:
I remember hearing the song "Stay" for the first time in 1992 and thinking it was a breath of fresh air compared to most of the other bleak stuff dominating the airwaves at the time (grunge, rap, etc...).  Great video too.

I have three special requests, if at all possible:

The song "Both Sides Now" by Joni Mitchell and Judy Collins, or anyone else who covered it competently.  

Also, "Heart and Soul" by T'Pau.  I am trying to complete an 80's/MTV video collection and can't find a decent, non-mangled copy of the original video.  

And "Close (To the Edit)" by Art of Noise.  

If you have any of those in your collection, please hook a brother up.

Hi Chartsandgrafs
Thanks for your writing. Your comments and suggestions are always greatly appreciated
In regards to your request.. I Found In My Collection :  Close (To The Edit) and  Heart And Soul
I will upload it  soon
